dService: Empowering Your Data Science Journey

Try dService  ➚

Project Overview

dService is a platform that provides international students with detailed information and personalized insights on over 50 US-based data science master's programs. The "by students for students" project aims to simplify the process of selected a graduate program and provide helpful information to international students. By providing accurate and up-to-date information, the platform empowers students to make informed decisions that align with their academic and career goals.

Key Features

We are creating a platform or resource center for international students to access information and resources on data science graduate programs & careers.

Explore Data Science Master's programs across the United States
Get an overview of tuition fees for Data Science programs
Find the perfect Data Science program that meets your needs
Learn about potential career paths in Data Science and the required skills
Browse through Data Science programs on our dataset

Why Data Science?

Data science has become an essential tool for various industries and applications, revolutionizing the way we understand, analyze, and utilize data.

Who are DAFinity?

We are four international students who are currently applying for data science programs and dedicating to help others with data.

Dear visitors,

We are excited to announce that our project will be transitioning to open source on 5/31/2023. This means that the project will be publicly available for others to use, modify, and contribute to. The code will be available on dService repository on GitHub . The project will be released under the GNU General Public License. We are excited to see how the project will continue to evolve in the hands of the open source community. Thank you for your support throughout the development of the project.

Sincerely,

DAfinity
